p: The quality of the gel tablets was assessed by the appearance of mold (assayed fungal growth during storage) [ 15]. The longer the gel tablets do not mold, the more effectively the preservative acts against microorganisms. The influence of preservatives on the quality of the gel tablets was determined during the stability study: the days after which mold began to grow on the chewable gel tablets in a plastic box (CR) or the ones stored in the refrigerator (PBR) were counted.
